scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist/* && cp ./index.html ./dist/index.html && cp ./conversations.html ./dist/conversations.html && cp ./make.html ./dist/make.html && cp ./performance.html ./dist/performance.html && cp ./info.html ./dist/info.html && cp -avr ./css/ ./dist/ && cp ./main.js ./dist/main.js && cp ./p5.min.js ./dist/p5.min.js && cp ./conversations.js ./dist/conversations.js && cp ./info.js ./dist/info.js && cp ./performance.js ./dist/performance.js && cp ./make.js ./dist/make.js && cp -avr ./images/ ./dist/ && cp -avr ./sounds/ ./dist/
